Plot: Two women are abducted by a group of snuff filmmakers and brought into a Hellish nightmare of unmistakable brutality, viciousness and destruction that will leave every viewer shocked, amazed and awestruck.
Title: American Guinea Pig: Bouquet of Guts and Gore
Actors: Ashley Lynn Caputo, Caitlyn Dailey, Lilly Dickenson, Eight The Chosen One
